name: Chr. Hansen A/S
bossPosition: General Counsel and Corporate Vice President
goal:
Chr. Hansen is a global bioscience company that develops natural solutions for the food, nutritional, pharmaceutical and agricultural industries.

Chr. Hansen develops and produces cultures, enzymes, probiotics and natural colors for a rich variety of foods, confectionery, beverages, dietary supplements, animal feed, and plant protection. Product innovation is based on around 40,000 microbial strains – often referred to as “good bacteria.”
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: EU Farm to Fork Strategy, Sustainable food production, Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), Animal Health, Plant Health, Human Health, Infant Health, Natural Colors, Circular Economy, Natural Ingredients, Probiotics, Bioprotection, Anti-Listeria.
